mapper.select: select count(1) as count from syslog WHERE createTime like '%${startTime}%'
select HOUR(createTime) as hour,count(1) as count from syslog WHERE createTime like '%${startTime}%' GROUP BY HOUR(createTime) ORDER BY HOUR(createTime)
select DAY(createTime) as day,count(1) as count from syslog WHERE createTime like '%${startTime}%' GROUP BY DAY(createTime) ORDER BY DAY(createTime)
select MONTH(createTime) as month,count(1) as count from syslog WHERE createTime like '%${startTime}%' GROUP BY MONTH(createTime) ORDER BY MONTH(createTime)
